title: Min tlan ta
lyrics:
Beram No thisen a tlan ka ni,
chu tlanna ropui hril ka nuam;
Khawngaihna kang lova tlan ka ni,
Chatuana tan a fa ka ni.

Min tlan Beram No thisenin min tlan
Min tlan, min tlan, chatuana tan a fa

Isuan min tlanna a va lawmawm,
ka hril seng lo ka lawmna thu;
Englai pawhin min awm pui reng thin,
Ka thinglungah ennna min pe.

A lal ropuina a inthuamin,
A hmel mawi ka la hmu dawn si;
A hmangaihna in min hruai zel a,
Zan thim hnuaiah pawh ka fak ang.
